content.content: @timbeiko is gathering feedback from the community to understand needs, impacts, and constraints relating to EIP-1559. In the spirit of this I created this thread for public posting from stakeholders at wallet providers, but definitely reach out to him directly as well.   twitter.com    Tim Beiko | timbeiko.eth (TimBeiko)  Second group was for wallets 🔐  @Ledger, @metamask_io, @CoinbaseWallet, @MyCrypto (other suggestions welcome 😁) Tim Beiko | timbeiko.eth @TimBeikoGiven that at the end of the day, most usage of Ethereum is either done by major projects (Uniswap, tether, etc.) or via certain tooling (exchanges, wallets, etc.), those are the folks for which we need to gauge "implementation likeliness".    10:53 AM - 7 Sep 2020
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post, Tim Beiko, is asking for feedback from stakeholders at wallet providers regarding EIP-1559. He created a thread for public posting and also reached out to specific wallet providers. The goal is to understand the needs, impacts, and constraints relating to EIP-1559 and gauge the implementation likeliness for major projects and tooling.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback

content.content: @timbeiko is gathering feedback from the community to understand needs, impacts, and constraints relating to EIP-1559. In the spirit of this I created this thread for public posting from infrastructure providers, but definitely reach out to him directly as well.   twitter.com    Tim Beiko | timbeiko.eth (TimBeiko)  Finally, various infrastructure providers ⛓  @infura_io, @etherscan, @trufflesuite, @myetherwallet, @ETHGasStation Tim Beiko | timbeiko.eth @TimBeikoGiven that at the end of the day, most usage of Ethereum is either done by major projects (Uniswap, tether, etc.) or via certain tooling (exchanges, wallets, etc.), those are the folks for which we need to gauge "implementation likeliness".    10:53 AM - 7 Sep 2020
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is asking for feedback from infrastructure providers regarding EIP-1559. The post also extends an invitation to the community to provide feedback and suggests reaching out to the author directly. The author emphasizes the importance of gauging the "implementation likeliness" of major projects and certain tooling.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback
